section.section: A licensee may surrender a license by sending to the Commissioner a written statement that the license is surrendered.

text.section:
The surrender of a license does not:
Affect any administrative, civil, or criminal liability of the licensee for acts committed before the license is surrendered;
Affect the surety bond required under § 12-914 of this subtitle; or
Entitle the licensee to the return of any fee paid to the Commissioner under § 12-904 of this subtitle.
